data.pricing_trends: Pricing for flights to Denmark typically sees a decrease in April, with average round-trip prices around $600. May sees a slight increase due to tourist influx.
data.booking_windows: Optimal booking time is 3-4 months in advance for better pricing and availability.
data.demand: There is a growing trend in eco-tourism and city breaks to Denmark. May is particularly in demand for gradual warm weather and outdoor activities.
data.competition: Alternative destinations include Norway and Sweden with similar attractions, but Denmark's unique culture and cozy atmosphere draw travelers.
